title: Building a strong stable roster for 2019
body:
Dear Players,

We are trying to build a strong stable team to work with in 2019.
The team will have several plans as in doing online tournaments , lan parties , participating in league competitions.
We are looking for German / Dutch players to achieve these goals.

Here are some requirements :
- 18+
- Discord
- Platinum / Diamond
- Understand the tasks that comes with the lane + able to adapt to meta changes
- Good attitude as in no flame ( constructive critisism is aloud )
- Being available 4 times a week ( might shift to 5 some times )
- Deep Champion pool
- Atleast Gold in Flex Ranked

If u are willing to join this team make sure u add KSHJonathan on the League Client.
We will have a conversation with u and according to that converstation we will plan in a try-out for the team.
We are only looking for serious and dedicated people.

The spots that are still available in the team are :

Toplane
Jungle
Midlane

PS : KSHJonathan is a recruiting smurf account.

Sincerely Danny
